StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCandidatePriorService]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@PersonID int ,@EndDate date.me ,@ComponentCode varchar(2))
AS
SELECT CPS.rowguid AS ID, CPS.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, CPS.BEGIN_DATE, CPS.END_DATE, CPS.PMOS_CODE, CPS.SERVICE_CHARACTER, CPS.SEPARATION_CODE, CPS.REENLISTMENT_CODE, CPS.VERIFICATION, CPS.SERVICE_ID, CPS.CURRENTLY_IN_RESERVES, CPS.END_OF_OBLIGATED_SERVICE_DATE, COALESCE(CPS.COMPONENT_CODE, (SELECT TOP 1 N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE FROM NWA N WHERE N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonID ORDER BY N.NWA_ID DESC), SPACE(0)) AS COMPONENT_CODE, CPS.PROS, CPS.CONS, CPS.USER_LOGIN, CPS.UPDATE_DATE FROM CANDIDATE_PRIOR_SERVICE CPS WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN COMPONENT_CODE CC ON (CPS.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonId AND CPS.END_DATE = @EndDate AND CPS.COMPONENT_CODE = @ComponentCode AND CPS.COMPONENT_CODE = CC.COMPONENT_CODE)
